codeanticode.syphon
Class SyphonServer

java.lang.Object
  codeanticode.syphon.SyphonServer

public class SyphonServer
extends java.lang.Object

Syphon server class. It broadcasts the textures encapsulated in PImage objects when the OPENGL2 renderer is used.
